channel.title: Problem with Whonix Gateway after VPN instalation
channel.description:
Hello,
I bought my first VPN yesterday, It is IPVanish. I am using whonix-gateway on VirtualBox. Recently when I was connecting without VPN everything works perfectly. There were no problem. After VPN instalation I have problem with Whonix time synchronisation. When I turn off VPN there once again everything is OK. Anyone can help me?

item.title: Problem with Whonix Gateway after VPN instalation
item.dc:creator: victeron
item.description:
Hello,

I bought my first VPN yesterday, It is IPVanish. I am using whonix-gateway on VirtualBox. Recently when I was connecting without VPN everything works perfectly. There were no problem. After VPN instalation I have problem with Whonix time synchronisation. When I turn off VPN there once again everything is OK.
Anyone can help me?

Read full topic
